import random from'lodash/random';// Array of available nodes to connect to
var nodes=[process.env.REACT_APP_NODE_1,process.env.REACT_APP_NODE_2,process.env.REACT_APP_NODE_3];var getNodeUrl=function getNodeUrl(){var randomIndex=random(0,nodes.length-1);return nodes[randomIndex];};export default getNodeUrl;
